attributes.action: Online home schooling for children bc of vulnerable parents till Covid disappear
attributes.additional_details: Because Children are not making social distancing & School staff is failing at keeping this.200 children in cafeteria lunch can be seated without masks. Some don't wear bc of Breathlessness.Teachers carrying viruses to their parents& vulnerable so as children spreading. More deaths more covid positive. USA also gives two options to parents now days whether to send school at their consent or else does home schooling.We must stop our generation from the burden of bereavement & being an orphan!!
attributes.background: Close the schools because of Covid19 & start home schooling on line everyday to carry out the syllabus & homeworks. So School staff Parents & Elderly at risk can be  saved till Covid19 completely disappears

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require schools to support home learning during Covid-19 outbreak: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334065

Scrap fines for families with vulnerable members that keep children from school: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/549629
